On 11.05.2010 20:11, Suresh Kumar wrote:
> Thanks Mike.
>
> My goal is to manage only the members of a list, especially removing
> multiple items from the list. Which HTTP method is most suitable for
> such a use case? i.e. given a list of members, what is the best way to
> remove a subset of the members from the list?
>
> Best Regards,
> Suresh

Are you sure that a set of DELETE requests (that could be pipelined) 
isn't good enough?

Keep in mind that if you don't use DELETE and instead batch things 
together then intermediaries will not be aware of what's going on (which 
may or not may make a difference in practice).

Best regards, Julian
